text:
3rd Avenue, east side, north from 19th Street, showing the demolition of buildings for the widening of the thoroughfare. This area later became part of Gowanus Parkway, the northerly sector of the Belt Parkway system in Brooklyn.

View 1: October 17, 1940
View 2: April 21, 1941

P. L. Sperr

View 3 is north from 19th Street, showing construction on the Parkway; view 4 is south from 17th Street.

View 3 is north from 19th Street, showing construction on the Parkway; view 4 is south from 17th Street.

19th Street, east from Third Avenue.  The buildings in the foreground were later razed, when Third Avenue was widened and made part of the Belt Parkway.
View 1:  September 22, 1940
View 2:  Oct. 23, 1940
View 2:  19th St., west from Third Avenue.
P. L. Sperr

19th Street, east from Third Avenue.  The buildings in the foreground were later razed, when Third Avenue was widened and made part of the Belt Parkway.
View 1:  September 22, 1940
View 2:  Oct. 23, 1940
View 2:  19th St., west from Third Avenue.
P. L. Sperr
